text: Narendra Jha (2 September 1962 – 14 March 2018) was an Indian actor. Jha is known for his work in Bollywood productions; his most noted movies being Haider, Raees, Ghayal Once Again, Hamari Adhuri Kahani, Mohenjo Daro, Shorgul, My Father Iqbal, Force 2, Kaabil, 2016 The End. Jha died at his farmhouse in Nashik early on 14 March 2018 after suffering a massive heart attack. He was 55 years old.Raees actor Narendra Jha dead, Hansal Mehta tweets ‘this profession is truly a killer’ == References == == Other websites == * Category:1962 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Indian television actors Category:Indian movie actors Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Narendra Jha
